title: ICE when compiling rustc: assertion failed: end <= self.len()

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Tried to compile latest master (de64f85c6ec82) and got this ICE:

```
rustc: i686-pc-windows-gnu/stage1/bin/rustlib/i686-pc-windows-gnu/lib/librustc_typeck
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: end <= self.len()', F:\Dokumente\Coding\rust\rust-lang\src\libcore\slice.rs:432

stack backtrace:
   1: 0x62861db0 - ZN2rt4init20h7f2d7421a1ae3e14wwyE
   2: 0x686857dc - ZN6unwind18begin_unwind_inner20h551a7e48b95e0456iicE
   3: 0x686855fa - ZN6unwind16begin_unwind_fmt20h027bb3e628386864FfcE
   4: 0x68685455 - rust_begin_unwind
   5: 0x686da03f - ZN9panicking9panic_fmt20h7df9c1e9789d415aStlE
   6: 0x686d6ff0 - ZN3num6u8.Int12rotate_right20ha1ac74b632cded4ebUaE
   7: 0x6f224bfb - ZN8metadata10filesearch23FileSearch$LT$$x27a$GT$6search20ha7175874d3de3781riyE
   8: 0x6f21d4ce - ZN8metadata7csearch10is_typedef20h152221e2f9ba5983v2wE
   9: 0x6f215110 - ZN8metadata6cstore6CStore18add_used_link_args20h71a7e93157c856a0hzwE
  10: 0x6f210bec - ZN8metadata7creader44Env$LT$$x27a$GT$.visit..Visitor$LT$$x27v$GT$15visit_view_item20h0e5806d1b90c86b26svE
  11: 0x6f2103df - ZN8metadata7creader11read_crates20ha78a3b33d1c758050rvE
  12: 0x6a4b7c6b - ZN6driver23assign_node_ids_and_map44NodeIdAssigner$LT$$x27a$GT$.ast_map..FoldOps6new_id20h630f7acb602fc367IqaE
  13: 0x6a450e5a - ZN6driver27phase_3_run_analysis_passes20h7acb51d45b11988eCtaE
  14: 0x6a44378b - ZN6driver13compile_input20hca1671aed62075edpbaE
  15: 0x6a4d0629 - ZN7monitor20h9820e2c9e984ce2eTHcE
  16: 0x6a4db38e - ZN7version20hf78fa49686b2ba5fE6bE
  17: 0x6284e79a - ZN4task11TaskBuilder14spawn_internal20h7dd366bf6ef01ffb0CpE
  18: 0x686840e6 - ZN4task4Task3run20h07e2795df99be2a3PEbE
  19: 0x686852ec - ZN6unwind8Unwinder9unwinding20h5c9f3bfd11423a54m7bE
  20: 0x68683bd9 - ZN6thread22Thread$LT$$LP$$RP$$GT$11spawn_stack20h6ab219a530b92b30xYbE
  21: 0x6868512b - ZN6thread7cleanup20hd73793846cb633a5HUbE
  22: 0x770a9f72 - RtlInitializeExceptionChain
```

I got this ICE for `rustc_trans` and for `rustc_typeck` (same stack backtrace for both).
